English: Huatan township in Changhua county `彰化縣~|`彰~`化~县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan

d.f: `種植~`花草~`的~`高臺~，`四周~`砌磚~`石~，`用來~`點綴~`庭園~。

q: 《`儒林外史~．`第~`五~`五~`回~》：「`花壇~`酒社~，`都~`沒有~`那些~`才俊~`之~`人~；`禮樂~`文章~，`也~`不見~`那些~`賢人~`講究~。」

English: Huatan township in Changhua county `彰化縣~|`彰~`化~县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
decorative mass planting of flowers and shrubs, often bounded by a low masonry border, and often part of a streetscape
